text: Anđelko Habazin Anđelko Habazin (7 November 1924 – 6 October 1978) was a Croatian philosopher. Anđelko Habazin was born in Zagreb (Croatia), where he graduated from the university with a degree in philosophy in 1954. He received his doctorate degree in philosophy from the University of Sarajevo (Bosnia and Herzegovina) in 1962. He worked as a professor at the University of Banja Luka (Bosnia and Herzegovina), and then at the University of Zadar (Croatia) from 1974 until 1978. He died in Zadar, aged 54. ==References== Category:1924 births Category:1978 deaths Category:Croatian philosophers Category:University of Zagreb alumni Category:University of Sarajevo alumni Category:University of Banja Luka faculty Category:University of Zadar faculty Category:People from Zagreb Category:20th-century philosophers
title: Anđelko Habazin
